import _classCallCheck from"/Users/usuario/Desktop/Ironhack/week7/2ShowHome/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from'axios';var Services=function Services(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,Services);this.getAllEvents=function(){return _this._service.get('/event/getAllEvents');};this.getOneEvent=function(id){return _this._service.get("/event/".concat(id));};this.postEvent=function(event){return _this._service.post('/event/newEvent',event);};this.EventEdit=function(event,eventID){return _this._service.post('/event/edit',{event:event,eventID:eventID});};this.deleteEvent=function(eventID){return _this._service.get("/event/delete/".concat(eventID));};this.getOut=function(idEvent,idUser){return _this._service.post('/event/exitEvent',{idEvent:idEvent,idUser:idUser});};this.joinedEvent=function(idEvent,idUser){return _this._service.post("/event/join",{idEvent:idEvent,idUser:idUser});};this.selectTheEvent=function(id){return _this._service.post('/event/selectEvent',{id:id});};this.uploadFileCloudinary=function(theFile){return _this._service.post('/event/fileUpload',theFile);};this._service=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_URL),withCredentials:true// RUTAS PERSISTENTES
});};export{Services as default};
